content.query:
USE warburg;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC selectValuesFromView @MainContainer NVARCHAR(50), @StorageFileLocation NVARCHAR(50), @LastProcessDate NVARCHAR(50), @Operation NVARCHAR(50), @LoadType NVARCHAR(50)
AS

If @LoadType = 'Incremental'
BEGIN
DECLARE @Incremental VARCHAR(MAX)= '
    SELECT
        *, '''+@Operation+''' as Operation
    FROM
        [dbo].['+@StorageFileLocation+']
    WHERE
        ModifyDate >= CONVERT(datetime2,'''+@LastProcessDate+''', 127)
'
EXEC (@Incremental)
END

ELSE If @LoadType = 'Full'
BEGIN

DECLARE @Full VARCHAR(MAX)= '
    SELECT
        *, '''+@Operation+''' as Operation
    FROM
        [dbo].['+@StorageFileLocation+']
'
EXEC (@Full)
END
